id: Remains of fetuses and infants found at second Detroit funeral home
paragraph: Set edition preference:Set edition preference:Set edition preference:By Jason Hanna and Kwegyirba Croffie, CNNUpdated 11:08 AM ET, Sun October 21, 2018 Chat with us in Facebook Messenger. Find out what's happening in the world as it unfolds. (CNN)Michigan authorities say they've found improperly kept remains of fetuses and infants at a second Detroit funeral home, just one week after similar remains were found at the first.CNN's Laura Ly, Augusta Anthony, Evan Simko-Bednarski, Kwegyirba Croffie and Amir Vera contributed to this report.
